Name: Appointment
Description: Appointment is where a party appoints a person to fill a role or position.

Properties.Name: Appointed by
Properties.Description: The person or organization which gave direction to fill a role

Properties.Name: Appointed Role
Properties.Description: A role, job or title to which a person can be appointed

Properties.Name: Appointee
Properties.Description: The person appointed to the role

Properties.Name: Declared on
Properties.Description: The date on which the appointment was officialy declared by the appointer
